name: Killer Plant
description:
In this game, you have feed people to a killer plant, so it can evolve.

You can drag humans around to feed them to the plant, or to put them in the human grinder to earn money.

Buy upgrades to earn more money and lure more people to the plant.

Note: I couldn't finish the game in time, because I had a really busy week.  I hope it's enjoyable to play.
